apc.stylesheet..monaco-workbench .activitybar>.content: transform: scaleY(0); opacity: 0; height: 50% !important; border-left: 3px solid var(--vscode-panelTitle-activeBorder) !important; content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; width: 0; z-index: 1; border-radius: 8px;top: 0; bottom: 0; margin: auto; transition: transform 167ms cubic-bezier(0,0,0,1);
height: 0%; border-top: 2px solid; content: ''; position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; width: 0%; z-index: 1; border-radius: 8px; margin: auto; transition: all 0.1s ease-in;
apc.stylesheet..part.panel.basepanel.bottom.pane-compos: border-radius: 8px; position: absolute;left: 0;right: 0;bottom: 0; top: 0;margin-inline: 8px;margin-bottom: 8px; border: transparent !important; background-color: transparent !important;
apc.stylesheet..vertical > .slider: transform: scaleX(0.5) !important; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #a9a9a9 !important; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in; margin-right: 16px !important; right: 16px !important;
apc.stylesheet..horizontal > .slider: transform: scaleY(0.5) !important; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #a9a9a9 !important; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in;
apc.stylesheet..monaco-inputbox.idle, .suggest-input-co: background-color: hsla(0, 0%, 100%, .061) !important; border-radius: 4px !important; align-items: center; background-clip: padding-box; display: flex; inline-size: 100%; position: relative; border: 1px solid hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 6.98%) !important; border-bottom: 1px solid hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 54.42%) !important;
background-color: hsla(var(--vscode-input-background), 70%) !important; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vscode-panelTitle-activeBorder) !important; outline: none !important;
apc.stylesheet..part.sidebar.pane-composite-part: border-radius: 8px; border-color: transparent !important; position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; top: 0; margin-inline: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px !important; overflow: hidden !important; height: calc(100% - 8px); padding-bottom: 8px !important; background-color: var(--vscode-editor-background) !important; padding-inline: 4px;
apc.stylesheet..monaco-list-row::before: transform: scaleY(0); opacity: 0; height: 50% !important; border-left: 3px solid var(--vscode-panelTitle-activeBorder) !important; content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; width: 0; z-index: 1; border-radius: 8px; top: 0; bottom: 0; margin: auto; transition: transform 167ms cubic-bezier(0,0,0,1); left: 2px;
apc.stylesheet..split-view-container > .split-view-view: top: unset !important; position: relative !important; max-height: calc(100% - 80px) !important;
apc.stylesheet..part.editor: border: 1px solid var(--vscode-titleBar-activeBackground); border-radius: 8px; position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; top: 0; margin-inline: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px;
